name: Performapal Pop-Up
desc: Send up to 3 cards from your hand to the GY; draw the same number of cards you sent to the GY, then, if you have 2 cards in your Pendulum Zones, you can Special Summon "Performapal" monsters, "Magician" Pendulum Monsters, and/or "Odd-Eyes" monsters from your hand with different names that have Levels between (exclusive) the Pendulum Scales of the cards in your Pendulum Zones, up to the number of cards you drew by this effect. If you did not Special Summon by this card's effect, you lose 1000 LP for each card in your hand. You can only activate 1 "Performapal Pop-Up" per turn.
